title: The Whitechapel Diaries
main_question: What is the true nature of the killings mapped by the diary, and who orchestrates them?
hypotheses: A single, preternaturally skilled killer acting alone.
A coordinated group using the myth of a lone Ripper as camouflage.
A philanthropic trust masking darker practices under charity routes.
red_herings: The idea that anatomical precision alone proves a surgeon is responsible.
The assumption that official Yard files are complete and honest.

threads.label: Coach Route
threads.description: Murders and sightings align with a potential coach route through Whitechapel and toward the river stairs.

threads.label: Charity Tokens
threads.description: Brass tokens and pamphlets link victims to specific philanthropic networks.

threads.label: Staged Precision
threads.description: Evidence suggests the killer's surgical skill may be exaggerated or deliberately misrepresented.
